Title: January 2014
Content: 22*p42919a02228*7	 the scientific article you have studied is adapted from articles in nature and new scientist.  use the information from the article and your own knowledge to answer the following questions.	*(a)	 describe how the krebs cycle is involved in ‘burning up fuel’ (paragraph 2).(6)	(b)	 the unique merger ‘gave rise to all complex, or eukaryotic, cells’ (paragraph 4).  the presence of a nucleus is characteristic of eukaryotic cells.		describe the structure of a nucleus.(3)
